reviewText:
Hot Body Competition Babe of the Decade is one hour and thirty-one minutes long and was released on DVD on March 14, 2001. There are at least over four dozen mostly beautiful women in this DVD. I say mostly because there are about 15% of them that are not that hot to look at and one has to say what John Cross was thinking. Basically these are clips from other Hot Body videos and the women in the majority of the contests only have a thirty seconds or less air time. It was only during the Top Ten Countdown Contest Girl of the Year and Babe of the Decade Contest does the ladies names appear on screen. Decade part is only fifteen minutes long and one wonders why the choose Babe of the Decade as a title. All ladies in the video are nude all the time and follow the same pattern. They are dancing in the nude, stripping in the nude, pole dancing, or fondling their breasts. I was somewhat disappointed in this video that it did not live up to its title. In the end Hot Body Competition Babe of the Decade gets a B-. Below are the order of segments as they appear.
